columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the account.

columns.name: organization_id
columns.description: The unique identifier (ID) of an organization, if applicable.

columns.name: organization_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an organization.

columns.name: organization_feature_set
columns.description: Specifies the functionality that currently is available to the organization. If set to \"ALL\", then all features are enabled and policies can be applied to accounts in the organization. If set to \"CONSOLIDATED_BILLING\", then only consolidated billing functionality is available.

columns.name: organization_master_account_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account that is designated as the management account for the organization

columns.name: organization_master_account_email
columns.description: The email address that is associated with the AWS account that is designated as the management account for the organization

columns.name: organization_master_account_id
columns.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the management account of an organization

columns.name: organization_available_policy_types
columns.description: The Region opt-in status. The possible values are opt-in-not-required, opted-in, and not-opted-in

columns.name: account_aliases
columns.description: A list of aliases associated with the account, if applicable.
